articles.title: Test Persistence Article
articles.summary: This article tests the persistence system

introText: Today's digest covers Apple product reviews and new devices, major AI policy and industry developments, and key business, geopolitical, and security news. It also highlights health and climate updates, entertainment headlines, and notable legal cases.

articles.title: Apple iPhone Air review: statement piece
articles.summary: Verge reviews the iPhone Air focusing on thin design tradeoffs; discusses impact on battery life, heat, and camera, and whether the thinner chassis changes user experience.

articles.title: The iPhone 17 is the one to get this year
articles.summary: Verge argues iPhone 17 offers best balance of features, performance, and value; discusses design, camera, battery life, processor, and ecosystem.

articles.title: Apple’s iPhone 17 Pro is a bold redesign but a basic upgrade
articles.summary: Focus on redesign vs incremental gains; compares to standard model and prior Pro; evaluates whether price is justified by real-world benefits.

articles.title: Garmin’s Bounce watch for kids doubles the price, not the features
articles.summary: Critique of price increases relative to features; discusses LTE tracking and safety features for kids; evaluates value against competitors.

articles.title: Microsoft’s Xbox PC app adds Steam games and access to other stores
articles.summary: Update to Xbox PC app adds Steam games and access to other storefronts; expands game library and impact on PC gaming market.

articles.title: Google’s Windows desktop app brings a Spotlight-like search bar to PC
articles.summary: Google Windows desktop app introduces Spotlight-like search bar; discusses discovery, integration with Google services, and user workflow.

articles.title: Waymo gets green light for airport service in San Francisco
articles.summary: Waymo granted permit to operate autonomous taxis at SFO; outlines permit conditions and implications for urban mobility.

articles.title: Apple Watch SE 3 review: statement piece
articles.summary: SE 3 review assesses value, battery life, health sensors, performance, and watchOS features relative to higher-end models.

articles.title: Meta created its own super PAC to politically kneecap its AI rivals
articles.summary: Reports that Meta organized a super PAC to influence policy and public opinion against AI rivals; discusses implications for competition and regulation.

articles.title: The hunger strike to end AI
articles.summary: Explores activism and debates around AI governance and rapid development; profiles organizers and policy questions at stake.

articles.title: Grieving parents press Congress to act on AI chatbots
articles.summary: Families advocate for federal safeguards as they link AI-chatbot incidents to child safety; discusses legislative momentum.

articles.title: The right wing is creating its own society of snitches
articles.summary: Analyzes harassment dynamics and platform moderation in right-wing online communities and policy implications.

articles.title: Silicon Valley bets big on ‘environments’ to train AI agents
articles.summary: Examines investments in simulated environments and synthetic data to train AI agents; discusses benefits and governance considerations.

articles.title: Democrats retaliate against GOP for Ilhan Omar censure vote
articles.summary: Describes partisan use of censure motions in Congress as political maneuvering amid tensions.

articles.title: Alex Pfeiffer leaves White House for Watchtower Strategy
articles.summary: Reports the White House communications director is joining a public affairs firm; notes potential impact on administration messaging.

articles.title: Alphabet earnings live updates: AI, Gemini 2.0, Google Cloud, and more
articles.summary: Live coverage of Alphabet’s quarterly earnings with emphasis on AI initiatives, Gemini 2.0, and Google Cloud.

articles.title: Groww, backed by Satya Nadella, set to become first Indian startup to go public after U.S.-to-India move
articles.summary: Groww plans an IPO; backing by Satya Nadella; discusses regulatory context and implications for Indian fintech.

articles.title: CodeRabbit raises $60M, valuing the 2-year-old AI code review startup at $550M
articles.summary: CodeRabbit secures $60M in funding; valuation $550M; outlines product focus and expected growth.

articles.title: Google Ventures doubles down on dev tool startup Blacksmith just 4 months after its seed round
articles.summary: GV makes follow-on investment in Blacksmith; discusses strategic rationale and developer-tools market.

articles.title: Investors Are Bullish as a Pivotal Fed Decision Looms
articles.summary: Markets show optimism ahead of a key Federal Reserve decision; notes S&P 500 near highs and rate-cut expectations.

articles.title: What to Watch at the Federal Reserve’s September Meeting
articles.summary: Outlines indicators and expectations analysts will monitor at the Fed meeting and potential market impact.

articles.title: Jerry van Ben & Jerry’s weg bij ijsbedrijf na langlopend conflict met Unilever
articles.summary: Founders exit Ben & Jerry’s amid protracted dispute with Unilever; discusses implications for brand and investors.

articles.title: Akkoord tussen VS en China over verkoop TikTok aanstaande
articles.summary: Updates on negotiations over TikTok sale; summarizes deal terms and geopolitical context.

articles.title: Netanyahu and an Israel Without Restraint
articles.summary: Analysis of Netanyahu’s stance as Israel intensifies operations in Gaza and regional diplomacy evolves.

articles.title: Israel Pounds Gaza City as Fears Mount for Those Inside
articles.summary: Reports on renewed Israeli assault on Gaza City and humanitarian concerns for residents.

articles.title: Israel’s Assault on Gaza City Stifles Hope of Diplomatic Resolution to War
articles.summary: Analysis of how ongoing military action affects diplomatic avenues toward resolving the war.

articles.title: European Commission wants sanctions against Israeli ministers and Hamas leaders
articles.summary: EU considers targeted sanctions in response to Gaza crisis; discusses diplomatic implications.

articles.title: Akkoord tussen VS en China over verkoop TikTok aanstaande
articles.summary: Update on talks between the U.S. and China regarding TikTok sale and privacy/regulation considerations.

articles.title: Britse rechter houdt deportatie migrant onder deal met Frankrijk tegen
articles.summary: A UK court blocks deportation under a migration agreement with France; discusses human rights considerations.

articles.title: EU sanctions against Israel ministers and Hamas leaders
articles.summary: EU moves to impose sanctions on Israeli ministers and Hamas leaders amid Gaza crisis; diplomatic ramifications explored.

articles.title: Palestinian on the run: 'We want peace' after internet and phone outage
articles.summary: Report on communication blackouts in Gaza; includes a refugee’s call for peace and humanitarian access.

articles.title: Cel en tbs geëist tegen man die kwetsbare jongen gebruikte als 'seksslaaf'
articles.summary: Public prosecution seeks life imprisonment and psychiatric detention for a man accused of exploiting a vulnerable boy as a sex slave.

articles.title: OM eist 18 jaar cel en tbs voor moord op Rotterdamse psychiater
articles.summary: Prosecution seeks 18 years in prison and psychiatric detention for a man accused of murdering a Rotterdam psychiatrist after a sexual encounter.

articles.title: Hoofdverdachte in zaak-Maddie McCann vrijgelaten uit gevangenis
articles.summary: Main suspect in the Maddie McCann case released from custody as authorities say there is no longer a legal basis to continue detention.

articles.title: Gevangenismedewerkers thuis belaagd: drie explosies en een zware mishandeling
articles.summary: Threats against prison staff include explosions and severe assaults at their homes; investigations ongoing.

articles.title: Tyler Robinson aangeklaagd voor moord, verschijnt voor het eerst in rechtbank
articles.summary: Tyler Robinson charged with murder; major upcoming court proceedings and potential witnesses.

articles.title: Al Gore on China’s climate rise: ‘I would not have seen this coming’
articles.summary: Al Gore discusses China's rising climate trajectory and implications for global decarbonization and diplomacy.

articles.title: Denmark close to wiping out cancer-causing HPV strains after vaccine roll-out
articles.summary: Denmark nearing elimination of high-risk HPV strains due to vaccination program; discusses public health impact.

articles.title: It Isn’t Just America. The Whole World Has Soured on Climate Politics.
articles.summary: Long-form analysis of fading optimism in global climate governance and possible new approaches to climate action.

articles.title: Climate Change’s Toll in Europe This Summer: Thousands of Extra Deaths
articles.summary: Report on excess deaths in Europe due to extreme heat and climate-driven risks; discusses public health adaptation needs.

articles.title: Het klimaatdoel van 2030 is vrijwel buiten bereik, stelt het PBL
articles.summary: PBL says 2030 climate target is nearly out of reach without large-scale energy transition actions; urges major policy measures.

articles.title: Actrice en zangeres Joke Bruijs (73) overleden, onder andere bekend van 'Toen was geluk heel gewoon'
articles.summary: Obituary noting Joke Bruijs’ career and cultural impact in theatre, film, and music.

articles.title: The Morning Show season 4 premieres on Apple TV+, as Apple greenlights season 5
articles.summary: Season 4 premieres; Apple renews for a fifth season; outlines upcoming storylines and release.

articles.title: Apple TV+ shows and movies: Everything to watch on Apple TV Plus
articles.summary: Catalog-style guide listing major Apple TV+ originals and titles; notes where to watch and trailers.

articles.title: Shai-Hulud malware attack: Tinycolor and over 40 NPM packages compromised
articles.summary: Reports a supply-chain attack affecting Tinycolor and 40+ npm packages; discusses indicators of compromise and mitigations.

articles.title: DataTables CDN Outage – post incident review
articles.summary: Post-incident review detailing timeline, root cause, remediation, and lessons learned for DataTables CDN outage.

articles.title: The Asus Gaming Laptop ACPI Firmware Bug: A Deep Technical Investigation
articles.summary: Technical analysis of an ACPI firmware vulnerability in Asus gaming laptops; discusses attack vectors and mitigations.

articles.title: Notion API importer, with Databases to Bases conversion bounty
articles.summary: Notion API importer project with a database conversion bounty; describes mapping challenges and collaboration scope.

articles.title: Why We're Building Stategraph: Terraform State as a Distributed Systems Problem
articles.summary: argues Terraform state should be treated as a distributed system; outlines architectures to coordinate state across environments.
